description: Create an organization invoices batch PDF generation

flags.description: Organization invoices batch PDF template ID (required)
flags.name: --organization-pdf-template

permissions: Allowed when create? is permitted for the related organization invoices batch via delegated policy.
side_effects: Creates PDF file records for invoice revisions and queues asynchronous PDF generation.
validation_notes: --organization-invoices-batch and --organization-pdf-template are required. status and generation_metadata are read-only attributes; pdf_files is a read-only relationship; organization_invoices_batch and organization_pdf_template are create-only relationships.
